Comment:
Limit of snow water equivalent when the surface is fully covered with snow. Not needed if `SnowUse` = 0 in `RunControl.nml` .

Example values:

- 190: Paved Järvi et al. (2014) :cite:`J14`

- 190: Bldgs Järvi et al. (2014) :cite:`J14`

- 190: BSoil Järvi et al. (2014) :cite:`J14`
